Latest Updates

6 and 7 February 2020

Anugoonj Prelims 2020

A TWO DAY EXTRAVAGANZA with the best of talent, enthusiasm and entertainment at ‘Anugoonj Prelims’ 2020 at TIPS. Students of various colleges participated in competitions, showcasing their skills and unmatched enthusiasm. Be it literary, dance or singing competitions, all filled with unlimited entertainment and splendid creativity.

10 February 2020

Celebrity Talks Series

GNITING YOUNG MINDS- Trinity Institute of Professional Studies organised ‘Celebrity Talk Series’ with the inaugural talk on ‘Digital Content, New Opportunities in Cinema, Mass Communication, Journalism and Events’. The star celebrities included Ms. Flora Saini, a renowned actress and ‘Stree’ movie star, Ms. Laila Panda, a well known model, Odissi dancer and actress in conversation with Mr.Amit Agarwal, popular film maker and film consultant. The talk turned out to be highly enriching and inspirational for students.

22 February 2020

Alumni Meet 2020

REKINDLING MEMORIES- Trinity Institute of Professional Studies organised alumni meet, ‘Reunirse’ 2020 with great pomp. With a line up of thunderous events, the meet turned out to be highly entertaining and also touched an emotional chord by making everyone nostalgic. The event concluded on a happy note with games, interaction and dancing with great gaiety.

Welcome To Trinity Institute of Professional Studies

Welcome To

Trinity Institute of Professional Studies

TIPS, Dwarka is a premium educational institute located at a stone’s throw distance from Sector 10 Metro Station, Dwarka (opposite pillar no. 1160).The Institute has been accredited A+ Grade by SFRC, Govt. of Delhi establishing it as a top notch brand in the field of education. All courses offered by the institute are affiliated to GGSIP University.

Higlights of Tips
  • Centrally all weather air-conditioned building.
  • Two OTIS high speed Escalators/Lifts.
  • Active training and placement cell to groom students for internship & placements.

3 YEAR OF COURSE

Bachelor of Arts in Journalism & Mass Comm. (B.A JMC)


Trinity Institute of Professional Studies (TIPS) offers Bachelor of Arts in Journalism and Mass Communication (BAJMC) is a three year undergraduate course aimed to imbibe journalistic and communication skills within the students, enabling them to prove their mettle in the media industry. It is a comprehensive and dynamic course, designed to enlighten students about the media industry, make them well versed with all the aspects of the field and prepare them to serve as responsible professionals. The curriculum is so designed to cover both theoretical and practical subjects and provide hands on training to the students. Owing to their well-developed skills and practical knowledge, our students have been placed in leading print & electronic media organisations over the years. India Today, AajTak, Red FM, PTI, Navbharat Times and Hungama TV are just to name a few, where our students got placed and proved themselves, making us proud and elated. The ever evolving and vibrant media industry needs more responsible and skilled individuals as TIPS has always delivered and will continue to do so in the times to come. As part of the course, students go through summer training in print media and prepare a brief report. They also undergo functional exposure in electronic media and submit a project report on the same. Students are provided with the best equipment for their project wor...

Know more
3 YEAR OF COURSE

Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)


Bachelor in Computer Application is one of the most popular courses among the students who want to make their career in the IT (Information Technology) field. It is a three year undergraduate course which strengthens the knowledge and skills of students as per the requirement of the Information Technology (IT) industry. BCA is a course designed to give an insight to the students regarding various CS & IT concepts and their practical applications as well. This course enables the students to grab promising opportunities available to them in the leading companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, etc. Regular mock tests and personality development programs are organized by the institute to prepare the students for the industry. As a part of the curriculum, students undertake summer internship at the end of the fourth semester. Students are provided with the updated versions of the software like Oracle, SQL server, Netbeans, Red hat Linux etc. Experience based learning is encouraged by the institute through activities like conferences, interviews, seminars, IT quiz etc. Program Educational Objectives (PEOs) Program Educational objectives of the BCA program at Trinity Institute of Professional Studies emphasize on holistic grooming of the student. The objectives for the course are designed, considering that BCA graduates will be able to: PEO1: Develop software solutions to p...

3 YEAR OF COURSE

Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)


Trinity Institute of Professional Studies (TIPS) offers BBA, a three year undergraduate programme that familiarizes students with the managerial functions, develops excellent communication skills, decision making abilities that are required to manage and run a successful business enterprise. The emphasis on quality and excellence has made TIPS the best institute for BBA course in Delhi NCR. This course covers all core management subjects which helps students to learn the theoretical as well as practical aspects of business management which aids them in becoming successful managers, entrepreneurs and leaders. Regular workshops and internships transform the students into efficient professionals who are prepared to take on any challenge that come their way. Moreover, management games and role play activities are also conducted in the class on a regular basis. TIPS, owing to its focused goals, innovative and practical learning based teaching pedagogy has secured a name for itself in the field of management education. Students at the end of the course secure placements in reputed companies and TIPS is proud of its alumni who have proved their mettle in the industry, by performing to the best of their abilities. Program Educational objectives (PEOs): The Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) Program has following four Program Educational objectives (PEOs): PEO1: To equ...

3 YEAR OF COURSE

Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com (H))


Trinity Institute of Professional Studies offers Bachelor of Commerce (Honors), a three year undergraduate programme for the students interested in commerce and management. B. Com (Hons.) is one of the most suitable courses for the students who have an inclination towards commerce, business and finance sector. The practical and industry oriented approach of the course enables an individual to get well versed with different aspects of the field. The extensive knowledge provided through the designed course proves beneficial for the ones aiming to gain proficiency in Accounts, Economics, Finance, Taxation and much more. Regular industrial visits allow students to get an overall understanding of the functioning of the corporate sector, Knowledge enriched programmes and guest lectures by expert faculties and professionals from corporate sector are conducted to impart practical inputs to the students of the management department. Moreover, students undergo summer training and prepare a report on the same and they also submit an industry specific major project report as part of their syllabus. A hands-on experience is given to the students through class room training programmes in crucial subjects like Financial Modelling, management games and role play activities. Students of B.Com (H) have been placed with multi-national companies like Google, South Indian Bank, Grasshoppers, Jayp...

Know more
5 YEAR OF COURSE

Bachelor of Law (BA.LLB)


Trinity Institute of Professional Studies (TIPS) offers B.A. LL.B, an integrated five year programme under its Department of Law which is approved by the Bar Council of India and is affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU). The course is structured in a special way so as to bridge the gap between theoretical inputs and practical application to prepare the students to meet the requirements of the industry. Keeping in mind this vision, the Department of Law is equipped with state of the art infrastructure including ICT enabled classrooms, moot court, a separate library with e-journal access, an activity room to facilitate debate and discussion and a Legal Aid Clinic exclusively for law students. Different kinds of visits such as Court visit, Parliament visit, Jail visit, Lok Adalat visit various Appellate Tribunals visit are conducted to enable the students get a knowledge and exposure to Court environment. At the end of every year, students go through summer internship training and prepare a brief report. Experimental based learning is promoted by the institute through extra-curricular activities like Conferences, Seminars, Moot Court Competition, Criminal/Civil Trial Advocacy Competition, Youth Parliament, MUN (Model United Nations), debates on current legal and social issues, Mock Interviews, Group Discussion, Legal Literacy Campaigns, Street Pla...

DIGNITARIES @ TIPS

Professor Yogesh Singh

Vice Chancellor, Delhi Technical University was the chief guest 7th National Conference on “Demonetisation and eMonetisation: The Road Ahead and Contribution of IT,Media & Mangement”

Chandarchur Singh

One of the leading bollywood actor graced the event El – Veda 2017 to bid farewell to batch 2014-17. He graced the event with his performance and was the highlight of the entire show.

Ms. Geetanjali Goel

Honourable Judge ADJ and Special Secretary, Delhi Legal Services Authority addressed the students at ‘One day Seminar On Gender Equality And Women Empowerment’

Ms. Veditha Reddy, IAS

IAS Deputy Commissioner, Rohini Zone was a chief guest El-Veda- 2019, bidding farewell to the third-year students on April 17,2019. The event was held at Vivanta by Taj, Dwarka.

Mr Aleksei Illiuviev

Cultural Secretary, Embassy of the Russian Federation graced the occasion of TRANSDUCTION: Freshers' Party at Vivanta by Taj, Dwarka for the session 2018.

Mr. Sachin Arora

Assistant Editor, Zee News came for a Special Guest Lecture for the students of Journalism and Mass Communication and felicitated students of TIPS, who won at various events at Media Mahakumbh (IIMC Media Festival).
